derivation: from H5605 (סָפַף), in its original sense of containing;
outline:
1. a spreading out, basin, goblet, bowl
    1. basin, goblet
  2. threshold, sill
    1. threshold, sill, door-keeper
kjv_def: bason, bowl, cup, door (post), gate, post, threshold.
strongs_def: a vestibule (as a limit); also a dish (for holding blood or wine)
